method.name: get_supported_resolutions
method.description: Return an [Array] of containing [enum DepthCameraResolution], which are supported resolutions to use in [method set_resolution].

method.name: is_environment_depth_started
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if environment depth has been started; otherwise, [code]false[/code].

method.name: is_environment_depth_supported
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if environment depth is supported; otherwise, [code]false[/code].

method.name: set_resolution
method.description: Set the desired depth texture resolution to retrieve in the next frame. Default is [constant DEPTH_CAMERA_RESOLUTION_320x320].

method.name: set_smooth
method.description: Set whether the depth texture should be smooth or not. Default is [code]false[/code].

signal.name: openxr_android_environment_depth_started
signal.description: Emitted after environment depth successfully starts.

signal.name: openxr_android_environment_depth_stopped
signal.description: Emitted after environment depth successfully stops.
